    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • menu

        public void menu()
        Menu: Displays a menu with several options and executes the *corresponding method based on the user's selection.
        preconditions:
        A ReadXManager object has been created.
        postconditions:
        The corresponding method is executed based on the *user's selection.

      • manageBibliographic

        public void manageBibliographic()
        The method manages bibliographic products based on user input.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        Based on the user input, the method either registers, modifies or deletes bibliographic products.

      • registerBibliographic

        public void registerBibliographic()
        Method registerBibliographic: Registers a new bibliographic product.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        A new bibliographic product is registered and added to the ReadX's catalog.

      • modifyBibliographic

        public void modifyBibliographic()
        Modifies a bibliographic product's name or price.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        If the specified bibliographic product is found, its name or price is modified as requested and a message indicating success or failure is printed. If the product is not found, an error message is printed.

      • deleteBibliographic

        public void deleteBibliographic()
        Delete bibliographic: Deletes a bibliographic product from the ReadX catalog.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        If the specified bibliographic product is found, it is deleted from the catalog and a message indicating success is printed. If the product is not found, an error message is printed.

      • userRegister

        public void userRegister()
        User Register: Registers a new user in the ReadX system.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        If the user's data is valid and the registration is successful, a message indicating success is printed. Otherwise, an error message is printed.

      • acquireProducts

        public void acquireProducts()
        Acquire products: Allows a user to acquire a bibliographic product.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        If the user and product are found and the acquisition is successful, a message indicating success is printed. Otherwise, an error message is printed.

      • finishSuscription

        public void finishSuscription()
        Finished Suscriptions: Allows a user to end a subscription to a magazine.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        If the user and magazine are found and the subscription is successfully cancelled, a message indicating success is printed. Otherwise, an error message is printed.

      • productsLibrary

        public void productsLibrary()
        Library products: Displays the library of a user and allows them to interact with it.
        Preconditions:
        The user with the specified ID must exist in ReadX's database.
        Postconditions:
        Displays the user's library and allows them to perform the following actions: 1. View bibliographic products in the library. 2. Return a borrowed bibliographic product. 3. Exit the library.

      • generateObjects

        public void generateObjects()
        Generate objects: Generates a new bibliographic product or user object based on user input.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        If the user selects 1, a new bibliographic product is generated using the generateBiliographicProduct method. If the user selects 2, a new user is generated using the generateUser method.

      • generateBiliographicProduct

        public void generateBiliographicProduct()
        Generate product bibliographic automatically: Generates a new bibliographic product based on user input.
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        A new bibliographic product is generated and returned as a string.

      • generateUser

        public void generateUser()
        Generate users automatically: Generates a new user based on user input(user's type).
        Preconditions:
        None.
        Postconditions:
        A new user is generated and returned as a string.

      • simulateReading

        public void simulateReading()
        Simulate readings:Simulates a user reading a bibliographic product.
        Preconditions:
        The user must exist in the ReadX system.
        Postconditions:
        The user is able to read the selected *bibliographic product.

      • imprimProduct

        public void imprimProduct()

      • imprimUser

        public void imprimUser()
